item.title: Feds charge 4 in plot to export restricted Nvidia chips to China, Hong Kong
item.description: Chips sent to China as part of the alleged scheme included Nvidia's A100 and H200 graphics processing units, an indictment says.

item.title: White House crafting executive order to thwart state AI laws
item.description: The draft surfaced after President Donald Trump called for a single federal standard on AI "instead of a patchwork of 50 State Regulatory Regimes."

item.title: Epstein files bill signed by Trump, starting 30-day timer for their release
item.description: The Jeffrey Epstein files bill was overwhelmingly passed by the House and Senate. Only Republican Rep. Clay Higgins of Louisiana voting against it.

item.title: Trump to meet with New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani at White House on Friday
item.description: Zohran Mamdani said he plans to talk to President Donald Trump about the problem many New York City residents have with affording to live in the Big A...

item.title: House Democrat Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick charged with stealing $5M in Covid aid funds
item.description: Rep. Sheila Cherfilus-McCormick joined Congress in 2022 after winning a special election to fill the Florida seat of late Rep. Alcee Hastings.
